comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The year before this photo, 1935, she married Carl Keenan Seyfert, a fellow astronomer; they had two children, Carl Jr. and Gail Carol. Carl Sr. died in a car accident in 1960, age 49. messier.seds.org/xtra/Bios/seyfert.html en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Keenan_Seyfert Muriel was also an artist, and painted portraits that can be seen here: www.tnportraits.org/dyer-arthur-j-vand.htm www.tnportraits.org/seyfert-dr-carl-vand.htm In a terrible coincidence, their son Carl Keenan Seyfert Jr., a geology professor, also died in a car accident, in 2007: www.redorbit.com/news/business/1119368/carl_k_seyfert_jr_...

comment.author: 35047286@N02
comment._content: Please consider adding this photo to the pool "50th Anniversary of Women in Space" www.flickr.com/groups/womeninspace/pool/.
